Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. This product has been meticulously designed and developed to meet the highest standards, ensuring unparalleled performance and reliability. Given its exceptional quality, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This represents an excellent opportunity to secure a high-value asset at a competitive rate. We understand that the product's worth to you is estimated at $800,000, but we believe this offer presents a favorable balance between value and cost. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us. We look forward to the possibility of working with you and contributing to your success. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
